pages.title: Rituals
pages.text: Instead of bottling a brew, a full cauldron may instead be used to cast the effects as a ritual. Ritual casting requires the witch to add either a $(item)Taglock$() of the target or $(item)Tongue of Dog$() to cast it at the cauldron's location.

pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: A $(item)Bound Waystone$() may be added before the $(item)Tongue of Dog$(), to cast the ritual at the waystone's location. Some effects may require a second waystone to determine a source location.

pages.title: Covens & Strength
pages.text: The power of rituals effect and the maximum range a ritual may be cast is determined by how many witches from a coven participate in the ritual. A maximum of seven witches may participate.

pages.title: Dispersal
pages.text: Using a $(item)Taglock$() to start a ritual targets the bound creature. Otherwise a $(l:brewing/dispersal)dispersal$() must be added before the $(item)Tongue of Dog$(). Instant splash remains unchanged, but gas become an expanding effect and liquid produces rain.

pages.title: Risks & Power
pages.text: Performing a ritual with a cauldron needs altar power and, unlike pure circle magic, carries a risk of side-effects.

pages.title: Risks & Power
pages.text: Surrounding the cauldron with chalk circles can help offset the power requirements and augment the risks.

pages.title: Risks & Power
pages.text: Small and medium ritual circles can be used to moderately reduce power costs and eliminate side-effects

pages.title: Risks & Power
pages.text: Small and medium Infernal circles can be used to significantly reduce altar power costs, but at an increased risk of side-effects.$(br2)Red and white circles may be mixed as desired to get the appropriate balance of power costs and risks.

pages.title: Failed Rituals
pages.text: When a ritual fails, it will emit colored smoke:$(p)$(2)$(bold)Green$() Target too far$(br)$(1)$(bold)Blue$() Coven needed$(br)$(4)$(bold)Red$() Invalid circles$(br)$(6)$(bold)Yellow$() Underpowered$(br)$(5)$(bold)Purple$() Other failure.
$(br)Rituals will not start if there is too little power.

pages.title: Ritual of Raise Land
pages.text: The further from the cauldron the waystone points, the larger the coven must be
pages.details: Raises a cone of land. Increase strength to raise a wider area and further up

pages.title: Ext. Curse of Blindness
pages.text: The further from the victim, the larger the coven must be
pages.details: Applies curse of blindness to a target entity
